author: flo (tonebytone)
content:
Let's talk about this image, lol. I don't see why you consider this a bad image! It brought an immediate visceral response for me - that of being caged, hemmed in against my will - and with no way to escape.

As for "irrelevant," irrelevant to what? Asimov? But if you're referring to present times, it's very relevant - it illustrates how many people feel about how their governments have been taking away one freedom after another.
